channel.title: Comments on: BarCamp Belfast on 21st June, 2008

item.title: By: Greg Watkins
item.dc:creator: Greg Watkins
item.description:
This will be a great event. For all those attending we wish them a great day! Perhaps also this may be of interest.
http://siliconireland.blogspot.com/
Silicon Ireland Dublin, 26th June 2008. City North Hotel
